title: Monk Dawson
description:
Monk Dawson, released in 1998  ~  De Warrenne Pictures

directed and produced by Tom Waller and starring John Michie, Benedict Taylor, 
Martin Kemp, Rhona Mitra and Paula Hamilton. The film was based on the novel of the same name written by Piers Paul Read.

The film is about Eddie Dawson, a monk who has led a sheltered existence at 
a Benedictine monastery. When he is expelled from his Order he has to learn 
to deal with the realities of everyday life in 1970's London.

With " Monk Dawson - A closer look " feature, 4min 29s .

Released in Canada and the United States on DVD as "Passion of the Priest" .
